short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically import transaction history from online marketplaces and watch your tax form fill itself out.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seller Ledger automates bookkeeping for eCommerce merchants by directly importing sales, refunds, discounts, shipping and fee information from leading marketplaces as well as banks and credit cards. We automatically classify and tabulate those transactions and place them on the proper tax lines of a Schedule C tax report so tax time is a breeze. In addition, we help you see how much money you're making, not only as a business, but on individual sales as well.

Seller Ledger currently imports daily from:
* eBay
* Amazon
* Etsy
* Shopify
* PayPal
* Banks & Credit Cards

This extension expands the list of supported marketplaces to include:
* Poshmark
* More to come

Simply install the extension, log into your marketplace selling account and we'll do the rest.

Free to install. Requires a Seller Ledger account. If you do not yet have an account, you can sign up for a free 30-day trial, no credit card required at https://www.sellerledger.com
